    • Field Detail

      • ATMODE_OFF

        public static final int ATMODE_OFF
        Autotune not in use.

      • ATMODE_EN

      • ATMODE_THEN

        public static final int ATMODE_THEN
        Autotune threshold use enable.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • mode

        public int mode
        Autotune control. See ATMODE_OFF, ATMODE_EN and ATMODE_THEN.

      • thresholddBm

        public int thresholddBm
        Threshold when used. Reflected power higher than this value causes the autotune to execute.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AutotuneSetup

        public AutotuneSetup()

      • AutotuneSetup

        public AutotuneSetup(int mode,
                     int thresh)
        Controls the module's internal automatic tuning during inventories.
        Parameters:
        mode - Autotune enable/disable and threshold use enable/disable. See ATMODE_OFF, ATMODE_EN and ATMODE_THEN. The values are set with an OR-operation.
        thresh - Threshold when used and autotune enabled. Reflected power higher than this value causes the autotune to execute.
